desc: Stylish and intuitive home security to protect everything you care about. Everyone deserves peace of mind. Nooie makes it easy on the eyes and your wallet.

layout.text: A son’s first hero, a daughter’s first love.
This Father’s Day, gift your dad something thoughtful that makes his life easier and safer. Spend over $49 and get 4 Pack Nooie Smart Plugs at only $9.99.
